^(?![ \t]*;.*$)[ \t]*(PRINT(FORM)?D?[LW]?\s+.*|DATAFORM\s+.*|CALL (PRINT_DIALOGUE.*|(K2_)?HPH_PRINT.*|SPTALK.*|CHARA_TEXT.*|PRINT_STR.*|COLORMESSAGE.*))
